income_messages:
From: n************1@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-05-03 14:12:43
SUBJECT:   Good day,
  Good day,
How are you and your family today? I pray you are good and safe.
I represent a United Arab Emirates Base Investment Company, and due to
the negative impact of COVID-19 on Global businesses, we are offering
Corporate and Personal Loan.
We are a private limited firm made up, and funded by Arabs Investors
and Lenders as its shareholders across the Arab/Asia region. We would
be Interested to provide funding for you and your company at 3% per
annum for a period of 5-25 years. {Pure loan/Funding}.
We also pay 0.5% commission to Intermediaries/Consultants/Brokers who
introduce project owners for finance or other opportunities.
Let us know your position on this briefing as soon as possible for more details.
Best regards,
Mr. Nguyen Van Phong
Email: 
nguyenvphong51@gmail.com
From: n************1@gmail.com
To: fv78160@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-04 11:35:34
SUBJECT: Re: Good day,
Hello Elizabeth,
Your email message was received and acknowledges.
However I write to acknowledge receipt of your email message brief analysis
and wish to clarify and further explain as follows; we invite you to
benefit from our new Loan and Project funding referral program. We provide
investment capital for companies/ individuals to finance their business or
viable projects using our alternative finance structure without the usual
rigorous and stringent conditions experienced in the banks and some other
lending institutions.
Our Arabs Investors allows us to present loan requests ranging from
$1Million to $100 Billion Dollars. As long as it is a viable proposal, the
investors are willing to jointly invest with us. Investors however will be
doing all the necessary DD and risk assessment for any proposal we present.
If you think your firm will do better with our funding program; then email
us your project plan/executive summary in a compatible format (PDF
-recommended) for our review and consideration. What our investors want in
return is a sustainable interest repayment on the investment capital.
We would be Interested to provide funding for you at an interest rate of 3%
per annum for a period of 5-30 years. {Pure loan/Funding} We will be glad
to hear from you on any potential opportunity for onward consideration.
Regards,
Mr. Nguyen Van Phong
Investment accredited broker
Tel: +44 748 285 7218
+44 748 285 7218 (WhatsApp)
From: n************1@gmail.com
To: fv78160@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-04 22:34:44
SUBJECT: Re: Good day,
Hello Elizabeth,
I appreciate your response which content duly noted therein.
We look forward for future reference if the need arises as you have stated.
Regards,
Mr. Nguyen Van Phong
Investment accredited broker
Tel: +44 748 285 7218
+44 748 285 7218 (WhatsApp)
outbound_messages:
From: fv78160@l******s.email
To: n************1@gmail.com
Time: 2023-05-03 14:12:55
SUBJECT: Re:   Good day,
Dear Mr. Nguyen Van Phong,
Thank you for your email. My family and I are doing well, and I hope the same for you and your team.
I appreciate your offer for corporate and personal loan funding. However, I would like to know more about the terms and conditions of the loan, including the interest rate, repayment period, and any collateral requirements. 
Also, I would like to know more about your company and its track record in providing funding to businesses. Can you provide me with some references or case studies of successful projects that you have funded in the past?
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes,
Elizabeth
From: fv78160@l******s.email
To: n************1@gmail.com
Time: 2023-05-04 23:12:18
SUBJECT: Re: Good day,
Dear Mr. Nguyen Van Phong,
Thank you for your response. I am glad to hear that my message was received and noted. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you require any further assistance or have any questions.
Best wishes,
Elizabeth
